text: "Sabbath Bloody Sabbath" is a 1973 song by heavy metal band Black Sabbath and is the title track to their fifth studio album Sabbath Bloody Sabbath. The song was rarely played live during the 1970s and was played at the Heaven & Hell tour but was dropped thereafter. It has been covered by thrash metal band Anthrax and Swedish band The Cardigans for their debut studio album Emmerdale. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Black Sabbath songs Category:Anthrax (band) songs Category:The Cardigans songs
title: Sabbath Bloody Sabbath (song)
